members.name: base64ToGallery
members.description: Converts a base64 string to an image file in the device gallery

params.name: data
params.description: The actual base64 string that you want to save

params.name: options
params.description: An object with properties: prefix: string, mediaScanner: boolean. Prefix will be prepended to the filename. If true, mediaScanner runs Media Scanner on Android and saves to Camera Roll on iOS; if false, saves to Library folder on iOS.
